import React from 'react' import { reduxForm, Field } from 'redux-form' import { Input } from '../../common/FormsControls/Input' import { required, MinLength, MaxLength } from '../../../utils/Validators/validators' import {Redirect} from 'react-router-dom' import {Alert} from 'reactstrap' import {Link} from 'react-router-dom' import "../../common/FormsControls/Form.css" const MaxLengthCreator20=MaxLength(20) const MinLengthCreator5=MinLength(5) const LoginForm=(props)=>{ if(props.isAuth) { return } return(
log-in
forgot password
{props.errors.message? {props.errors.message} :null}
) } export const ReduxLoginForm=reduxForm({ form:'login' })(LoginForm)
